about_the_game:
Godlike Burger - Supporter Pack

About this Pack

This is a collection of bonus goodies for all those who wish to go the extra mile to support the developers of Godlike Burger!

Contents

  • An exclusive supporter skin for the chef
  • The complete Godlike Burger soundtrack
  • A selection of wallpapers
  • The Godlike Burger coloring book!
